28#include "includes.h"
29__RCSID("$NetBSD: msg.c,v 1.8 2019/01/27 02:08:33 pgoyette Exp $");
30#include <sys/types.h>
31#include <sys/uio.h>
32
33#include <errno.h>
34#include <stdio.h>
35#include <string.h>
36#include <unistd.h>
37#include <stdarg.h>
38#include <time.h>
39
40#include "sshbuf.h"
41#include "ssherr.h"
42#include "log.h"
43#include "atomicio.h"
44#include "msg.h"
45#include "misc.h"
46
47int
48ssh_msg_send(int fd, u_char type, struct sshbuf *m)
49{
50 u_char buf[5];
51 u_int mlen = sshbuf_len(m);
52
53 debug3("ssh_msg_send: type %u", (unsigned int)type & 0xff);
54
55 put_u32(buf, mlen + 1);
56 buf[4] = type; /* 1st byte of payload is mesg-type */
57 if (atomicio(vwrite, fd, buf, sizeof(buf)) != sizeof(buf)) {
58 error("ssh_msg_send: write");
59 return (-1);
60 }
61 if (atomicio(vwrite, fd, sshbuf_mutable_ptr(m), mlen) != mlen) {
62 error("ssh_msg_send: write");
63 return (-1);
64 }
65 return (0);
66}
67
68int
69ssh_msg_recv(int fd, struct sshbuf *m)
70{
71 u_char buf[4], *p;
72 u_int msg_len;
73 int r;
74
75 debug3("ssh_msg_recv entering");
76
77 if (atomicio(read, fd, buf, sizeof(buf)) != sizeof(buf)) {
78 if (errno != EPIPE)
79 error("ssh_msg_recv: read: header");
80 return (-1);
81 }
82 msg_len = get_u32(buf);
83 if (msg_len > 256 * 1024) {
84 error("ssh_msg_recv: read: bad msg_len %u", msg_len);
85 return (-1);
86 }
87 sshbuf_reset(m);
88 if ((r = sshbuf_reserve(m, msg_len, &p)) != 0) {
89 error("%s: buffer error: %s", __func__, ssh_err(r));
90 return -1;
91 }
92 if (atomicio(read, fd, p, msg_len) != msg_len) {
93 error("ssh_msg_recv: read: %s", strerror(errno));
94 return (-1);
95 }
96 return (0);
97}
98
